text.__SUMMARY__: Tillandsia balbisiana, common name northern needleleaf, is a species of bromeliad in the genus Tillandsia. This species in native to Mexico, Central America, Colombia, Venezuela, the West Indies, and Florida.
text.Cultivars:
Tillandsia 'Dura Flor'
Tillandsia 'Florida'
Tillandsia 'Polly Ellen'
Tillandsia 'Red Fountain'
Tillandsia 'Royale'
Tillandsia 'Timm'
